Package org.gearvrf.periodic

Schedule Runnables to run on the GL thread, in the future.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GVRPeriodicEngine.KeepRunning
    Optional callback that you can supply to GVRPeriodicEngine.runEvery(Runnable, float, float, KeepRunning).
    GVRPeriodicEngine.PeriodicEvent
    Represents a scheduled event.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GVRPeriodicEngine
    Schedule runnables to run on the GL thread at a future time.

Package org.gearvrf.periodic Description

Schedule Runnables to run on the GL thread, in the future. This is an optional component of GVRF: You need to get an instance to use it.

You can then schedule run-once events and periodic events. Periodic events may or may not have a callback.

Scheduling an event gives you an interface you can use to check on the event's status and/or to change its scheduling.
